read_pc.name: Pg 3900
read_pc.details: Listed as Pc for standardization purposes, the TS3900 does not have a chamber.

read_tc.name: Tg 3900
read_tc.details: Listed as Tc for standardization purposes, the TS3900 does not have a chamber.

read_status.name: Status 3900
read_status.details: -1 for purge, 0 for idle, 1 for running

read_mode.name: Mode 3900
read_mode.details: -1 for purge, 0 for idle, 1 for running

read_pu.name: Pressure units
read_pu.details: 0 for psi, 1 for bar, 2 for hPa

set_state.name: Operation state
set_state.details: -1 to purge, 0 to shutdown, 1 to generate

read_pp0.name: 3900 PPID Threshold Ratio
read_pp0.details: Begin average of setpoint when within PP0 ratio of setpoint

read_pp11.name: 3900 PPID Setpoint Average
read_pp11.details: Setpoint averaging when PP0 ratio from setpoint

read_fp5.name: 3900 FPID dP-dF
read_fp5.details: Amount flow decrease on pressure decrease (of current flow setpoint)

read_bp3.name: 3900 BPID Heat PW
read_bp3.details: Heat PW before bypass valve is used (secs)

read_bp5.name: 3900 BPID Heat Bypass
read_bp5.details: Bypass valve PW during heat mode

read_mp4.name: 3900 Num Clears
read_mp4.details: Number of clear cycles each key-press

read_mp8.name: 3900 BPID Integral PW
read_mp8.details: Bath PIC integral pulse width preload (secs)
